Question: This person won eight Grand Slam singles titles and two Grand Slam doubles titles with Ilie N?stase.
Hints: This person also irritated sponsors and tennis officials by shunning the end-of-year Masters championship from 1974 through 1976.
This person won all three meetings with Rod Laver in tour events.
This person was allowed only one serve per point and Navratilova was allowed to hit into half the doubles court.
